content: upgrade your layering game with this go-to cardigan made using the c2c corner-to-corner crochet technique this cardi is made entirely from simple rectangles which makes it ideal for garment beginners whether you re new to c2c or just looking for a quick satisfying project this pattern is an easy win ﻿﻿ this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and mobile viewing it includes graph patterns written instructions diagrams and links to relevant video tutorials ﻿ your c2c crochet cardigan will require worsted weight category 4 yarn such as lion brand scarfie lite and color theory ﻿ this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew find more of our favorite c2c crochet patterns 1 here 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/how-to-c2c-crochet/
